text:
Leapfin | Software Engineer | San Francisco, CA, US | ONSITE or REMOTE | Full Time | $120k+ We are an enterprise b2b finance software startup based in SF SOMA. Because we work with finance, we deal with lots and lots of data. We have found product/market fit and are growing rapidly, and we are looking for a technical leader who can help us scale.

We currently work primarily in Scala (Play / Slick), Postgres, and some JavaScript (React). We are looking for full-stack engineers able to wear many hats.

Job Posting: https://leapfin.com/careers

About: https://leapfin.com/about

Let me know if you have any questions.
